title: Lol freezes and stops my computer
body: So I log into league and starts out fine. So I join a game (any type). It freezes right when it starts the game. I force shutdown my computer and restart. When i rejoin it stops freezing and all you know is that everyone is lvl 5 or higher. I have it on a windows 10 pc and if anyone can help. Thanks.

replies.body: The freezing issue has been happening for a few players and may be due to a recent Windows 10 update that auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Basically, the program isn't working properly with League so disabling this should fix this up.  Hopefully, that does the trick!
